For other persons of the same name, see Robert Hill.
Robert F. Hill ( April 14, 1886, Port Rohen,
Ontario ,
Canada - March 18, 1966,
Los Angeles, California ) was a
Canadian
film director, screenwriter, and actor during the silent film era.
